oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of General Forrest's staff
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a post-Civil War print of a photograph of General Forrest's staff including William Forrest (standing), John W. Morton (standing). Seated is Col. D.C. Kelley (left), Dr. J.B. Cowan (center), and C.W. Anderson (right). William Forrest was the son of Gen. Forrest and served as an aide. Morton commanded Forrest's artillery. David C. Kelley commanded Forrest's Old 3rd Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA and was his most trusted subordinate. Dr. Cowan was the chief surgeon and Anderson served as adjutant-general.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Forrest, William;Morton, John W.;Kelley, D. C. (David Campbell), 1833-1909;Cowan, J.B.;Anderson, Charles W.
